Articles.Content: Sorry. I had to sleep and go to school. What have i missed?

Turn 5: http://www./download/mob6oftaabxdqt4/persistent.sfs

With the Bizmark destroyed, the Anya moved in to assist the Suzaku, and fired all 4 LMG missile salvos at the Naver. No visible damage was caused but I suspect I may have destroyed some internal mechanisms. Currently standing as:

Bizmark - Destroyed

Suzaku - Active

Anya - Active

Gino - Standing by
wait. are you doing multiplayer?

Pictures??
is this multiplayer? I want to join!

I'm unable to do live multiplayer, sadly.

Was about to excitedly mention the new multiplayer mod...

realise i'm late to the party. :L

Captrix how come you can't do live multiplayer?

realise i'm late to the party. :L

Evidently no one here has run a Minecraft Server before, there are alternatives to port-forwarding, like Hamachi, everyone go download Hamachi, unmanaged.

No one has made it work yet.

The Naver Launched two missiles at the Suzaku first hit smashed into the armor showing no signs of damage at all and the second missile scores a direct hit taking it out.

Battle of Eons Drift 5

I have to go into work for an emergency i dont know when ill be back

I have no Idea what I hit. I'm assuming that the first shot damaged the armor enough for the second to penetrate.

No one has done the multiplayer mod. Can someone send me a persistence that isnt Zekes duna orbiter? I cant get to the mun, let alone duna.

Camu can i join this battle?

Evidently no one here has run a Minecraft Server before, there are alternatives to port-forwarding, like Hamachi, everyone go download Hamachi, unmanaged.

No one has made it work yet.

Tried it. Hamachi is incompatible with Windows 7 without /also/ port forwarding.
It is compatible with Windows 7, the person running the server just has to disable their firewall whilst they run the server, I've done this before.
then make us a server. Please?

It is compatible with Windows 7, the person running the server just has to disable their firewall whilst they run the server, I've done this before.

I have done this. I not am moron. xP

Maybe instructions, please? Quit listing obvious things everyone would have tried already.

You'll all need to download Hamachi yourselves, and while I have the hardware, I can't figure out how to actually set up the server.

If Mister Daemon could help me with that, I could make it work.

You'll all need to download Hamachi yourselves, and while I have the hardware, I can't figure out how to actually set up the server.

If Mister Daemon could help me with that, I could make it work.

Tried Hamachi recently with Terraria. It refuses to ping anyone on my network. I followed every troubleshooting guide I could find.

Try reading the readme that came with the server program. It's inside the zip. very simple instructions.
It seems Spartwo and zekes are doing it, i wish they could tell us.

It seems Spartwo and zekes are doing it, i wish they could tell us.

They are not. Have patience.

They probably had Hamachi turned off.

Make sure that your firewall is OFF and not just allowing Terraria and all related programs through.
